name: Corvin
content:
Corvin was a Human man, who lived on the planet Dalicron-4 during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.
Corvin lived on Dalicron-4, with his wife and his son, Zanner. In 3 ABY, Zanner went missing during a storm and Corvin feared that his son had been swept into a river. However, a group of Alliance to Restore the Republic agents found Zanner in a nearby wood.
